Falters at times: The claim falters at times because it incorrectly assumes that the European Union flag will lose a star after the Brexit vote.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misconception and there are no plans to alter the European Union flag.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that the number of stars on the European Union flag represents the number of member countries.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim can be explained by the confusion and misinformation spread on social media regarding the removal of a star from the European Union flag.
